eheth uthuru nagenahira pawathi wargika arbudaya saha yuddhaya nima wa athi me mohothe siyalla hondin siduwanneya yana kalpanawen yuthuwa sanasum susum hela sahalluwen sitina wadi denek ee yuddhaye aarambhaka awadiye pawathi thaththwayan saha ehi wikashaya gana ehi sita lada athdakim naththawun bawin, arbudaye mula uputa nodamuwahoth eya yali liyala wadennata athi awakashaya owun wisin sulu kota thakanu dakina wita, 1977 di pamana ma ee gana lath athdakim satahan kara thabima wati yayi mama sithimi.
